engine
Class GameEngine

java.lang.Object
  engine.GameEngine

public class GameEngine
extends Object

Dummy DummyEngine class sortByFitness is needed by the GeneticAlgorithm, it must order the population by how good they are at winning games, best first the main method is a dummy version of what the engine might do, used to test the functionality of antBrain and antWorld classes To work out get the winner in a game, call world.getFoodInAnthills() or world.survivingAntsBySpecies() both return an int[], where index 0 == black and 1 == red high numbers are better for both

Version:
1.0
Author:
pkew20 / 57116
